title: ODODi vandEn
sahitya:
ODODi vandEn kaNNA nAn unakkum enakkumuLLa uravinru arindu


anupallavi

  kOTAnukOTi tavam sheidu unaikkANa gOvindA enrazhaittu brndAvanattiDai


caraNam    kuzhalUdum ezhil kANavE kUDum gOpiyargaL mukham nANavE kAdal
 vizhiyunra mukham nADavE muruval idazhOram shuzhittODavE jagannAthan
 ishai pADa nangai jati pODa kAla kAlamellAm shrutiyum layamumena
 vEdap-poruL unnil onri uraindiDavE bOdham mighu kAdal ponnaDi tanil koNDu
